page.title: 09FARMING
page.content: Most of the children who attend Sheriffhales school live on small farms which are mainly dairy farms having over 30 cows.Most of the farmers have over 50 acres, nearly all grass.Most of the farmers have silage, some have hay. All have tractors because it pulls and drives most of the machines on the farm. The next most popular machine is the combine harvester. The main crops are wheat, barley, sugar beet , potatoes, oil seed rape and grass although two farms in this area are growing a new kind of crop called Triticale which is a cross between wheat and rye for forage . Other equipment used on the farm dumper-truck, corn driers, sprayers, potato harvesters, beet harvesters, fork lift truck and 'Schaffers'(German made digger).Two farms have installed computers one is considering it.
